name: Record a maternity vaccine with nhs number [1-9693632109-BECCLES HOUSE-Vaccination Centre-yes-today+100-today-1-yes-yes-today-1-Bill GARTON-23/6/1946-1 MOUNT AVENUE, BARTON-UPON-HUMBER, S HUMBERSIDE, DN18 5DW-Pertussis-AUTOMATION-BIS-19/10/2028]
fullName: /app/features/record_a_vaccine_for_patient_with_nhs_number.feature:Record a maternity vaccine with nhs number

steps.name: Given I login to RAVS and set vaccinator details with BECCLES HOUSE and Vaccination Centre and get patient details for 9693632109 with option 1 and choose to vaccinate with vaccine details as Pertussis, AUTOMATION-BIS with 19/10/2028
And I search for a patient with the NHS number in the find a patient screen
And I open the patient record by clicking on patient Bill GARTON
When I click choose vaccine button and choose the Pertussis, AUTOMATION-BIS with 19/10/2028 and click continue
And I assess the pregnant patient's yes with the details of due date as today+100 and assessment date as today-1 and click continue to record consent screen button
And I record yes with the details and click continue to vaccinate button
And I record yes details and date as today-1 and click Continue to Check and confirm screen
Then I need to be able to see the patient Bill GARTON, 23/6/1946, 1 MOUNT AVENUE, BARTON-UPON-HUMBER, S HUMBERSIDE, DN18 5DW and vaccination details on the check and confirm screen

parameters.name: address
parameters.value: 1 MOUNT AVENUE, BARTON-UPON-HUMBER, S HUMBERSIDE, DN18 5DW

parameterValues: 1 MOUNT AVENUE, BARTON-UPON-HUMBER, S HUMBERSIDE, DN18 5DW
